A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was great. I think people a too critical of little things. You will laugh and there are unanswered questions at the end but... I am sure more questions will be answered at the end of the next one. People want to watch 12 episodes of a show in one day now... so how can a movie cram 12 hours of info and events into 2 hours for them... it can’t\, settle down\, and watch stranger things. The movie was amazing...
